plan.name: Material constraint test model
plan.description: This model test the procurement buffers. The model includes 9 different cases, each having the exact same demand pattern: - 1: Base scenario - 2: Procure in multiples - 3: Procurement with miniumum size, maximum size and in multiples - 4: Invalid parameters - 5: Procurement with minimum and maximum interval - 6: The full monty. Procurement with minimum interval, maximum interval, miniumum size, maximum size and in multiples - 7: Procurement with fixed interval - 8: Procurement in fixed quantity - 9: Procurement in fixed quantity with fixed interval - 10: Constrained procurement test

buffer.name: buffer 3
buffer.description: 3: Procurement with miniumum size, maximum size and in multiples

buffer.name: buffer 5
buffer.description: 5: Procurement with minimum and maximum interval

buffer.name: buffer 6
buffer.description: 6: The full monty. Procurement with minimum interval, maximum interval, miniumum size, maximum size and in multiples

buffer.name: buffer 9
buffer.description: 9: Procurement in fixed quantity with fixed interval
